snippet: After a week of pro-democracy demonstrations in Hong Hong, protesters occupying two of the city’s most crowded shopping districts came under assault on Friday night from men seeking to break up the protests.
abstract: After a week of pro-democracy demonstrations in Hong Hong, protesters occupying two of the city’s most crowded shopping districts came under assault on Friday night from men seeking to break up the protests.

headline.main: Hong Kong Protests, as Seen on Twitter: Oct. 3
